name: docs.bons.ai
description: Includes packages for testing and linting

scripts.check-links:
echo "Running Broken Link Checker on entire site
"; blc http://localhost:4567 -ro && echo "No broken links!" || echo "There are some broken links :("
scripts.write-good:
echo " Testing specified file for good grammar
"; write-good --no-illusion

author: Katherine Tole <katherine@bons.ai>
